info.author: Wola
info.name: wola-sdk
info.html_description:
Wola SDK
========

|Build Status|

Python SDK for Wola GraphQL

Installation
------------

Install from Github.

.. code:: sh

pip install git+https://github.com/WolaApplication/wola-sdk


Quick start
-----------

**Client**

.. code:: python

>>> import wola_sdk
>>> client = wola_sdk.WolaGql(
... url='https://gql.waveapplication.com',
... token='my-token')


**Get node**

.. code:: python

>>> query = '''
... {
... waves(duration_Gte: "30:00") {
... edges {
... node {
... id
... duration
... }
... }
... }
... }
... '''
>>> client.execute(query)

**Response**

.. code:: graphql

{
"data": {
"waves": {
"edges": [
{
"node": {
"id": "V2F2ZU5vZGU6Mg==",
"duration": "0:45:00"
}
}
]
}
}
}

**Exception handler**

.. code:: python

>>> try:
... client.execute(query)
... except wola_sdk.WolaGqlError as err:
... print(err.message)


Tests
-----

.. code:: sh

make test
